scripts.build:web: cd apps/mobile && npx expo export --platform web
scripts.eas:build:dev: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile development --platform all
scripts.eas:build:preview: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile preview --platform all
scripts.eas:build:prod: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile production --platform all
scripts.eas:build:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile production --platform ios
scripts.eas:build:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --profile production --platform android
scripts.deploy: npm run build:web && npx wrangler pages deploy --project-name lomito --branch main --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build:web && npx wrangler pages deploy --project-name lomito --branch preview --commit-dirty=true
